help.title: <u>Hardek's Functions</u>
Creature Functions
help.text: The following functions are concerned with creatures information.

function.name: creatureinfo
function.description: Returns a table with information about a creature, {name, exp, hp, ratio, maxdmg, bestspell}.

function.name: creaturemaxhp
function.description: Returns the maximum amount of HP a creature has.

function.name: creaturehp
function.description: Returns the current amount of HP a creature has.

function.name: creatureexp
function.description: Returns the amount of experience a creature gives.

function.name: expratio
function.description: Returns the reason EXP / HP of the creature.

function.name: maxdamage
function.description: Returns the maximum amount of HP you can loose in 1 turn concerning all monsters on your screen, optionally you can pass a creature name to know how much damage that creature can deal in 1 turn.

function.name: bestelement
function.description: Returns the creature's weakness (fire, ice, earth, energy, death, physical).

function.name: beststrongstrike
function.description: Returns the best STRONG strike spell against the creature.

function.name: beststrike
function.description: Returns the best strike spell against the creature.

function.name: bestspell
function.description: Returns the best strike spell against the creature.

help.title: Item Functions
help.text: The following functions are concerned with items information.

function.name: itemscosttocap
function.description: Returns cost when BUYING items from NPCs, as much as needed to reach 'cap' cap (use this to withdraw money before using buyitemstocap, for example).

help.title: Helper Functions
help.text: The following functions will help you making everyday scripts.

function.name: waitping
function.description: Wait based in your average ping, useful for most actions delay.

function.name: timeleft
function.description: Returns the number of seconds left to t. Example: timeleft('6:00') will return the number of seconds from now to 6am

function.name: tryexec
function.parameters: string cmd, int x, int y, int z, optional int maxtries
function.description: Check if the character is at the desired location, and executes the command, if unable, will try to reach the location x, y, z and try again, returns false if 'maxtries' tries is reached.

function.name: dontlist
function.description: Simply an alias for listas('dontlist').

function.name: euclideandist
function.description: Will calculate the euclidean distance between {sx, sy} and {dx, dy}.

help.title: Cavebot Functions
help.text: The following functions are very useful for caveboting, like buying items, refilling supplies depositing loot.

function.name: buyitemstocap
function.description: Will buy items 'itemname' until you reach 'cap' capacity, useful for potions or food, for example.

function.name: depositall
function.description: Just deposit all your gold (you must be near a NPC).

function.name: withdraw
function.parameters: int amount, optional string npc, optional bool sayhi=false
function.description: Safely withdraw the desired amount of gold from your acount by verifying the answer from the NPC, if no npc is passed, it will accept any message as an answer (not a big problem on most of times). The 'sayhi' parameter is for say hi or not before talking to the npc, true for saying and no for not saying.

function.name: opendepot
function.description: Reach and open a depot chest.

function.name: movetoinsist
function.parameters: int x, int y, int z, optional int maxtries=5
function.description: Tries and retries 'maxtries' times to reach the desired location.

function.name: refillsofts
function.description: Repairs all visible worn soft boots, considering visible money, will try getting more money on the bank in case you don't have enough with your character.

function.name: deposititems
function.parameters: dest, stack, from, open, item1, item2, ...
function.description: Deposits all {...} items on depot, separating stackables from normal ones, the boolean 'open' parameter is to set if the bot should open the depot chest or not. Parameter dest is the name of the container for normal items, parameter stack is the name of the container for stackable items/

function.name: dropitemsex
function.parameters: int cap, string item1, string item2, ...
function.description: Will drop the items described on parameters until you have reached `cap` capacity.

function.name: goback
function.description: Simply an alias for gotolabel(0).

help.title: Player Functions
help.text: The following functions are concerned with your characters information.

function.name: getelementword
function.description: Returns the word for the passed element. (vis, flam, frigo, mort, tera, san)

function.name: trapped
function.description: Checks if you are trapped, returns true if you are, false if you are not.

function.name: getplayerskill
function.description: Will return the characters skill (sword, club, axe or distance) value on a table {$skill, $skillpc}.

function.name: spelldamage
function.parameters: string spellname, optional level, optional mlevel, optional skill
function.description: Will return the min and max damage you can deal with the spell, pass the spell name, not words, i.e. energy wave or rage of the skies. Returns a table {min_damage, max_damage}.

example.name: Deposit items
example.description: This action will deposit your desired items on depot.

content.name: depositloot
content.hScript: from = '!!from!!' dest = '!!dest!!' items = {'royal helmet', 'dragon scale mail', 'small sapphire'} deposititems(dest, stack, from, !!opendp!!, items)
